replies.replyComment:
Me rate gnikawak nowana geniyak  kudu nogahana ekek, arakku nobona ekek, sigaret ganja  nobona ekek sallala kame noyana ekek, pita rata duwana ashwa race walata ottu dana üêÉ,  mahajana depola mankolla nokana ekek, badu wancha nokarana kappam noganna ekek innawanam kiyanna puluwanda ?
  Nomala geyakin aba eata hewwa wage puluwannam kiyanna. 
 Me okkoma karana eun athare mona balu wede karath ratata jathiyata aagamata aadare karana eun godai anna un thamai me kegahanne?
 Thamunuth me atharin ekak ho karana minihek bawa amathaka karanna epa.
Anunge kunu hodanna kalin oluwe thiyena deshapalana paksha paata maanasikathwayen duras wela me kathawa ahuwwoth hondai .
 Anusha ganikawak kiyana oba rata jathiya wenuwen wedak karla thiyenawa nam ahalapahala ekekge hari mole hodala me rate anagathaya rakinawa nam loku deyak.
